name: Directory of European Scouting and Guiding
body:
### Instructions
This is a draft of directory for enabling more direct contacts with scouts and guides across Europe. This is an initiative of the WOSM and WAGGGS European region ICT network.

This is a work in progress, to be presented at the regional conferences in Norway during summer 2016.

### Finland

- One national organization for WOSM and WAGGGS
-- (http://www.partio.fi/en)
- Facebook page for getting contacts
-- https://www.facebook.com/groups/ScoutVisitorsFinland/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
